data.caption: Veedol Corporation Limited Has Informed The Exchange That The Notice Of Offer For Sale (OFS) Of Shares Of Veedol Corporation Ltd. Has Been Withdrawn By Andrew Yule & Company Ltd. Due To Some Technical Glitches.
data.news_body:
Veedol Corporation Limited has informed the Exchange that the Notice of Offer for Sale (OFS) of shares of Veedol Corporation Ltd. has been withdrawn by Andrew Yule & Co. Ltd. due to some technical glitches.
It may please be noted that the aforesaid is solely at the instance of Andrew Yule & Co. Ltd. It is to clarify that Veedol Corporation Limited has nothing to do with the same.

data.caption: Withdrawal of Proposed offer for sale of equity shares of Veedol Corporation Limited (formerly Tide Water Oil Co. (I) Ltd.) by Andrew Yule & Company Limited through the stock exchange mechanism
data.news_body: With reference to earlier announcement dated May 22 2025 regarding "Notice of Offer for Sale of Shares by Promoter & Floor Price" Andrew Yule & Company Limited one of the promoters of Veedol Corporation Ltd (the "Promoter" or "Seller") has informed BSE that due to unavoidable circumstances the Notice for the Offer for Sale of shares dated May 22 2025 stands withdrawn till further notice as the shares could not be transferred to NSE Clearing Corporation Ltd. due to some technical glitches.

data.caption: Veedol Corporation Limited Has Informed The Exchange About The Pre-Dealing Application As Submitted By Andrew Yule & Co. Ltd. For Disposal Of 348480 Nos. Equity Shares Of Veedol Corporation Limited Has Been Approved.
data.news_body: Veedol Corporation Limited has informed the Exchange about the pre-dealing application as submitted by Andrew Yule & Co. Ltd. for disposal of 348480 nos. equity shares of Veedol Corporation Limited has been approved.

data.caption: Veedol Corporation Limited Has Informed The Exchange That The Company Has Received An Application For Pre-Dealing Approval Alongwith Necessary Undertaking In Connection With The Offer For Sale Of Shares By Andrew Yule & Co. Ltd.
data.news_body: Veedol Corporation Limited has informed the Exchange that the Company has received an application for pre-dealing approval alongwith necessary undertaking in connection with the Offer for Sale of Shares by Andrew Yule & Co. Ltd.

data.caption: Notice of Offer for Sale of shares by Promoter & Floor Price
data.news_body:
Andrew Yule & Company Limited is one of the promoters of Veedol Corporation Ltd (the "Promoter" or "Seller"). The Promoter proposes to sell up to 3.48480 Equity Shares of face value of Rs. 2 each representing 2% of the total issued and paid-up Equity Share capital of the Company ("Base Offer Size") on May 23. 2025 ("T Day") (for non-Retail Investors only) and on May 26 2025 ("T+1 Day") (for Retail Investors of the Company and for non-Retail Investors who choose to carry forward their unallotted bids from T Day) ("Offer Shares") through a separate designated window of the BSE Limited ("BSE") and the National Stock Exchange of India Limited ("NSE" together with BSE the "Stock Exchanges") collectively representing 2% of the total issued and paid-up Equity Share capital of the Company (held in dematerialized form in one or more demat accounts with the relevant depository participant) in accordance with the OFS Guidelines (such offer for sale hereinafter referred to as the "Offer").

- Dates and time of the opening and closing of the Offer : The Offer shall take place over two trading days on a separate window of the Stock Exchanges on May 23 2025 ("T Day") and May 26 2025 ("T+1 Day") from 9:15 a.m. and shall close at 3:30 p.m. (Indian Standard Time) on both days as per details given below:

For non-Retail Investors (defined below): May 23 2025 ("T Day")

Only non-Retail Investors shall be allowed to place their bids on T Day i.e. May 26. 2025. While placing their bids non-Retail Investors may indicate their willingness to carry forward their unallotted bids to T+1 Day for allocation to them in the unsubscribed portion of Retail Category (defined below).

The Offer shall take place during trading hours on a separate window of the Stock Exchanges on T Day i.e.. May 23 2025 commencing at 9:15 a.m. and shall close on the same date at 3:30 p.m. Indian Standard Time on the same day.

Those non-Retail Investors who have placed their bids on T Day and have chosen to carry forward their unallotted bids to T+1 Day shall be allowed to carry forward for allocation to them in the unsubscribedportion of Retail Category (defined below) and also revise their bids on T+1 Day as per the OFS Guidelines.

For Retail Investors (defined below) and for non-Retail Investors who choose to carry forward their unallotted bids to May 26 2025 ("T+1 Day")

The Offer shall continue to take place during trading hours on a separate window of the Stock Exchanges on T+1 Day i.e. May 26 2025 commencing at 9:15 a.m. and shall close on the same date at 3:30 p.m. Indian Standard Time on the same date.

Only Retail Investors shall be allowed to place their bids on T+1 Day i.e. May 26. 2025.

(T Day and T+1 Day collectively referred to as "Trade Dates")

- Floor Price : The floor price for the Offer shall be Rs. 1566.00 (Rupees One Thousand Five Hundred and Sixty Six only) per Equity Share of the Company.

Date: 08/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.
